page.title: 05HOME LIFE: GADGETS
page.content:
Many different electrical and electronic gadgets are used in the home today. Only five years ago very few families had microwave ovens or microcomputers,but now the microchip revolution has changed all that. I carried out a survey with the thirty members of my class(including me)to discover how many families had the following gadgets in use in June 1985.
Television 30 Fridge 30 Video 12 Hi Fi 28 Microwave oven 9 Telephone 30 Washing Machine 29 Computer 21 Freezer 30 Vacuum 30 Cooker 28
